WorkPerformanceCycle.name: WorkPerformanceCycle
WorkPerformanceCycle.description: Represents feedback that is gathered to assess the performance of a specific set of employees.

ActivityFrom.description: The date that you want to start filtering the WDC objects to help requesters create accurate summaries. The start of the evaluation period.

ActivityTo.description: The date that you want to stop filtering the WDC objects to help requesters create accurate summaries. The end of the evaluation period.

CurrentTask.description: The current task that the performance summary cycle is engaged in, including deploying and sharing.

LastManagerRequestsSharedDate.description: The date when all manager requests are set to be shared.

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this WorkPerformanceCycle.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this WorkPerformanceCycle. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the performance summary cycle that employees will participate in. This name is created by the administrator and is visible on all respective notifications and in the UI.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the WorkPerformanceCycle.

State.description: The state that the performance summary cycle is in. Available pick list values: Setup: The summary is in draft. In Progress: The summary is deployed and people are answering the questions that were created. Finished: The summary is no longer in progress. Error: The summary encountered an error.
